37ce258f-1bc1-404a-ab47-a7810fa39c02.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured

b092dcaf-0b2b-4ac9-97ad-4f8f994bb5dc.notes: Once adrift in your own thoughts, you must roll against Perception-5 in order to notice any event short of personal physical injury

from others aware of your clueless nature

2a4e7411-eac5-4582-990c-225a898f732a.name: Curious
2a4e7411-eac5-4582-990c-225a898f732a.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

b0eb3489-2333-4773-9d21-82b590535ab2.name: Impulsiveness
b0eb3489-2333-4773-9d21-82b590535ab2.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

features.situation: to resist Influence skills: Diplomacy, Fast-Talk, Intimidation, Savoir-Faire, Sex Appeal, and Streetwise

a9814888-c16d-4690-9bf6-71f4ef8441f8.name: Charitable
a9814888-c16d-4690-9bf6-71f4ef8441f8.notes: Make a self-control roll in any situation where you could render aid or are specifically asked for help, but should resist the urge

features.situation: to IQ-based skills when alone, or only -1 if in a group of 4 or less

defd66ee-f7d6-4e0e-bef6-9252d024fc8c.name: Loner
defd66ee-f7d6-4e0e-bef6-9252d024fc8c.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: to others on all Empathy, Body Language, and Psychology rolls to discern your intentions or the truth of your words
to others on IQ, Detect Lies, and Gambling rolls in any Quick Contest with your Acting, Fast-Talk, or Gambling skill when you try to lie or bluff

b870ac0c-f7bc-472f-9dd7-4cd8b2a0b08c.name: Honesty
b870ac0c-f7bc-472f-9dd7-4cd8b2a0b08c.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

features.situation: to all skill rolls whenever you believe that the odds are against you or others expect you to fail (GM’s judgment)

3d6b3b89-2caa-4f5c-b61a-a2c85da1432d.name: Short Attention Span
3d6b3b89-2caa-4f5c-b61a-a2c85da1432d.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you must maintain interest in something for an extended period of time, or whenever a distraction is offered. If you fail, you automatically fail at the task at hand.

0b6bef81-521d-41b6-87e2-9ad6a5c96ec5.name: Truthfulness
0b6bef81-521d-41b6-87e2-9ad6a5c96ec5.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you must keep silent about an uncomfortable truth (lying by omission). Roll at -5 if you actually have to tell a falsehood! If you fail, you blurt out the truth, or stumble so much that your lie is obvious.

5c8b1576-070f-4ef7-8c32-d411278b4451.name: Greed
5c8b1576-070f-4ef7-8c32-d411278b4451.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

features.situation: from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)
toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

ae030460-c6cc-4fb1-b463-15f191ab21d8.name: Lecherousness
ae030460-c6cc-4fb1-b463-15f191ab21d8.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have more than the briefest contact with an appealing member of the sex you find attractive, at -5 if this person is Handsome/Beautiful, or at -10 if Very Handsome/Very Beautiful. If you fail, you must make a “pass” using whatever wiles and skills you can bring to bear.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

0619acbd-512a-4309-b0a5-5991a45f6dae.name: Post-Combat Shakes
0619acbd-512a-4309-b0a5-5991a45f6dae.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

bc32b7fa-eefe-44cb-a533-82ef32280393.name: Trickster
bc32b7fa-eefe-44cb-a533-82ef32280393.notes: Make a self-control roll each day. If you fail, you must try to trick a dangerous subject: a skilled warrior, a dangerous monster, a whole group of reasonably competent opponents, etc. If you resist, you get a cumulative -1 per day to your self-control roll until you finally fail a roll!

48857509-bb3a-41a0-940e-650e93d10879.name: One of the following
48857509-bb3a-41a0-940e-650e93d10879.notes: Or spend 12 points to raise Inventor! by one level

d6e52bcb-2cb0-4a19-91c3-0b0190af019d.name: Two of the following
d6e52bcb-2cb0-4a19-91c3-0b0190af019d.notes: Or spend 8 points on a single skill

e9273a68-ebb8-4e14-9d0c-9580156d8afb.name: One of the following
e9273a68-ebb8-4e14-9d0c-9580156d8afb.notes: Or spend 2 points to take any unchosen skill from the two previous lists, at -1
